title: Patxi's Chicago Pizza
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Pizza, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Several other locations in the greater Bay Area. Chicago style deep dish as well as thin crust pizzas. Has a vegan pizza listed on the menu using Daiya cheese, or create your own pizza with choice of vegetable toppings. Has a few vegan appetizers.
